text: Au ga dumaalia gi digau Judah gii hui godou dama daane mo dama ahina. Digaula gaa hui labelaa godou dama gi digau Sabea, gaa lahi digaula gi nadau henua mogowaa loo.3.8 Isaiah 14.29-31; 23.1-18; Jeremiah 47.1-7; Ezekiel 25.15—28.26; Amos 1.6-10; Zephaniah 2.4-7; Zechariah 9.1-7; Matthew 11.21-22; Luke 10.13-14 Au go Dimaadua dela gu helekai.
